title: Problem-Based Learning (PBL) and Case-Based Reasoning (CBR) Enhanced Mathematics Problem-Solving Competency Program

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level basic mathematical concepts and practical work experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment for current practitioners, requiring advanced cognitive skills for mathematical problem-solving.

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to systematically analyze complex mathematical problems through a PBL (Problem-Based Learning) approach.
Learners develop the competency to search for similar cases in a case library and apply them to solving new problems.
Learners expand their knowledge structures by arguing and refuting problem-solving strategies through collaboration with peers.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
